Kebito you are exagerating beside the fact that i know that once in a while a file with that type of carachteristics can happen downloading files .

This is pure art of making files , you analise all the conteud of the file , then you check what can be worked and if that is ok inside the game then you make nice corrections in things that don´t alterate the gameplay and finally you make a positive compression with all the basic work that was done on the file . Sometimes it is a long and hard work doing this procedure depend on the game conteud other times it is work anyway but a little bit more simple , generaly speaking you can count with few hours work probably for a nice game and certainly some work at least independtly of the game , the degree of difficult making the work can oscilate because the type of the files the game have , the compression ratio of that files and how many files can be worked .

To dwabwa : the game works great with me with my own file , try to disable the protection shield of the antivirus if you have AVG or simpy unionstall the antivirus . If you have the requirements and all the normal support programs that support games updated : video card drivers , vcredist , directx , physx , the game must work , it is true that because a little different structure of a dll the antivirus programs can recognise that different structure as a virus with the intention to protect your computer but in this case is obvious that don´t make sense , it is just a worked file to let you play the game  . good luck and i hope you enjoy your game .

for those who still get general protection fault error

1 - Ignore the instructions in the main arc
2 - extract the arc file 
3 - use the 'obrigatory' update in the game folder following the instructions inside the update
4 - use the fix+update for deniable ops. follow the instructions inside the fix+update file
5 - run the game executable

game exec is in the src>system folder
